sentence: Managing Veterinary Medicine6 our laboratories have obtained ac - creditation from the China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) 12 FAPAS determine the capabilities of food testing and analysis laboratories can verify inspection methods for chemical components, microorganisms, etc., in food items such as meat, edible oils, baby food, vegetables, and so on.
Prior to high-risk operations, we conduct advance risk predictions and verify on-site operational norms to minimize production risks and safeguard employee safety.
